sourcesContent:
<form class="addBlog">
    <label for="ftitle">Title:</label>
    <input type="text" id="ftitle" name="ftitle" placeholder="Title blog">
    <label for="ldescription">Description:</label>
    <input type="text" id="ldescription" name="ldescription" placeholder="Description blog">
    <label for="fauthor">Author:</label>
    <input type="text" id="fauthor" name="fauthor" placeholder="Author blog">
    <button class="actionButton"> Add </button>
</form>
